content.prompt_es: Complete the sentences using the passive voice.
content.main_text: 1. The book ___ (write) by a famous author. 2. The project ___ (complete) last week. 3. The song ___ (sing) by the choir during the concert. 4. The dinner ___ (prepare) by my mother yesterday. 5. The results ___ (announce) at the meeting tomorrow.
content.explanation:
(1) En pasiva, 'was written' indica que la acción fue realizada por alguien en el pasado.
(2) Se usa 'was completed' porque la acción ocurrió en el pasado.
(3) El verbo 'sing' se convierte en 'sung' en forma pasiva.
(4) Aquí usamos 'was prepared' para indicar que alguien hizo la acción en el pasado.
(5) Utilizamos la forma futura pasiva 'will be announced' porque la acción ocurrirá en el futuro.

content.explanation: En este contexto, la palabra correcta es 'vacation' porque se refiere a un viaje o tiempo libre.
content.stimulus_en:

I hope you are doing well! I wanted to tell you about my recent vacation. I went to the beach and it was really amazing. The weather was perfect and I spent most of my time swimming and relaxing.

I also tried some delicious food. There were many restaurants by the beach. I loved the seafood!

I can't wait to hear about your summer plans. Let me know when we can catch up.

Take care,

Emily
